meta.description: Maximize profit from growing fruits on a farm

params.name: profit
params.description: Profit per acre for each fruit

vars.name: x
vars.description: Acres of land used for each fruit

vars.name: y
vars.description: y[f] = 1 if fruit f is grown, 0 otherwise

objective.name: max_total_profit
objective.expr: sum(profit[f] * x[f] for f in FRUITS)
objective.description: Maximize total profit from selected fruits

constraints.name: apples_pears_ratio
constraints.description: Apples land area at least twice pears

constraints.name: apples_lemons_ratio
constraints.description: Apples land area at least three times lemons

constraints.name: oranges_lemons_ratio
constraints.description: Oranges land area must be twice lemons

constraints.name: max_two_fruits
constraints.description: No more than two types of fruit can be grown

constraints.name: link_x_y_apples
constraints.description: Linking x and y for apples

constraints.name: link_x_y_pears
constraints.description: Linking x and y for pears

constraints.name: link_x_y_oranges
constraints.description: Linking x and y for oranges

constraints.name: link_x_y_lemons
constraints.description: Linking x and y for lemons
